amendment.description: Amendment encourages EPA to explicitly authorize States to include clean energy storage in their compliance plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-177 to offer a sense of Congress that the EPA should specifically address how the megawatt hours discharged from pumped hydroelectric storage will be incorporated in State and Federal implementation plans created by final rules made under section (2)(b) of this bill.
